website_summaries.verdict: Despite some longevity concerns, this LED light device has earned many happy customers for its reasonable price and effectiveness.
pros: Simple device that is rechargeable and easy to use
Emits LED red light that may minimize fine lines and wrinkles
Results may be possible in about a month with 3 treatments each week
3-minute timer alerts you when a session is complete
cons: A few faulty units quit working within a few months
Many users experienced noticeable results, but not all

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: All Pulsaderm photo advertising shows that the head clearly says 'Pulsaderm'... even in the manual that comes with it. However the device I was sent doesn't have it written on it and the button is different to all advertised photos on the internet and in the manual.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed. Will look for another similar product made by ...
customer_reviews.text: Received order very quickly and was very excited to try it. I tried to charge it when I first received it and it would not charge. So I turned it on and it was working so I just thought that it was charging because it was already fully charge. So I used it for 2 days then it needed recharging. At this point I went to recharge it and it still would not recharge....very disappointed. Will look for another similar product made by a different company that produces and delivers a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Purr

customer_reviews.title: Stimulating!
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised. I really didn’t expect much. The light actually made my skin tingle. I could feel something happening. I have very fair and dry skin. Immediately my skin looked shiny and healthy. It feels like I came back from a lovely day of sailing without the worry of sun damage. Overall my face feels warmer and alive. Nevermind if it gets rid of the wrinkles, it feels like I’ve been laughing with friends. After the tough stressed year, I promote this product as a stress reliever! Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: jennbooks

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny! 50 stars!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this off label for much longer than the 3 minutes daily for wound healing...not advising this to anyone else but it worked like a miracle and I would give it 50 stars if I could!! I have not tried it for other skin issues but likely will, as it obviously does have fantastic skin healing powers that are hard to believe for just LED lights. I charge it overnight and have no problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: scoop nation

customer_reviews.title: good product.  really works
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well on my hands. Age spots hardly noticeable now and skin got plumper.
customer_reviews.author: LOIS

customer_reviews.title: I started using the Pulsaderm Red Light after I charged ...
customer_reviews.text: I started using the Pulsaderm Red Light after I charged it fully. I have used it for 2 weeks and I can tell a difference in my skin. It is smoothing areas and decreasing problem spots. It does dry your skin, so therefore, moisturizing is nessesary after treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Gaye J.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: It is supposed to be new and look like is used
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not new or already defect
customer_reviews.text: The product is either used or defect. It looks as something is leaking. Maybe, a battery?
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: Was working for a month.... until now. Product is dead and will not charge..... I can't even return it because the return window is closed. Wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. I watch tv while I'm using it and the fact that it turns off when each section of your face is done is a plus. It also covers a large area at a time. Great purchase !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!!! Not a "deep" smoothness ...
customer_reviews.text: It actually works !!! Not a "deep" smoothness, but an overall smooth skin appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey T Collins

customer_reviews.title: helped with rosacea
customer_reviews.text: It took several weeks but I started to see an improvement in my rosacea. At this point my skin is much better and actually it feels less irritated and sensitive. I am not sure if it has made any difference with wrinkles but I am so pleased that the rednesses and pustules are gone. I find it is easy to use except around the nose as the surface is hard and inflexible. If you are struggling with rosacea it is definitely worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 3 months then DIED
customer_reviews.text: This helped with my skin and hair issues. It didn't cover a large area so you had to move it around. I noticed that my eyebrows and lashes started getting thick as well just from the light being near it. From my experience red light therapy does work. I will be looking for something to replace it by a different manufacturer. My biggest complaint is that for its cost it only last 3 months and then it died. So I cant return it for a replacement. So I feel I threw my money away.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Short life.
customer_reviews.text: Only used this about 50 times before the rechargeable battery stopped holding a charge. It is a piece of junk. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Boston Fellow

customer_reviews.title: Not a gimmick. It actually works.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the pulsaderm for anti-aging purposes. I've been using 3 times a week for about 7 weeks and I am shocked and amazed by the results I am seeing. The size of it makes it easy to use anywhere and it covers a good size area. It's very relaxing to use and one charge lasts me about a week before I have to recharge it. I do about 6 sections on my face and 2 on my neck and once on my chest so I am impressed by the longevity of the battery.
customer_reviews.author: May short

customer_reviews.title: Versatile red light instrument.
customer_reviews.text: The pulsassem has become my go to therapy for arthritis in my hip. The red light penetrates and relieves some of the pain. I don’t have to take so much Ibuprofen. I also use it after I have put cream on my face to help it penetrate deeper into the skin layers. I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Anna M Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Iffy
customer_reviews.text: Not really seeing any real noticeable results at almost 5 weeks
customer_reviews.author: lisavet

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: So far I am very pleased with this product. I am a regular visitor to the local red light salon. This hand held device is used to fill-in on other days. I have been very pleased with the quality of this device. Be prepared to charge it after each use.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE  / Used and broken.
customer_reviews.text: I order it and got an open box, with a dirty product, that seems to havebeen used to 6 months - 1 year. Is not white but yellowish and brown in some parts, its definetly used. Worst, after plugged onto the wall, it doesnt even works!! Its dead. Never buy this s... again. At least from here.
customer_reviews.author: German O.

customer_reviews.title: broke in two months!
customer_reviews.text: You would think it would last longer. just simply quit and it is past the window of return
customer_reviews.author: patricia a north

customer_reviews.title: Huge treatment head, dense LED array
customer_reviews.text: I just got this minutes ago and I'm already totally pleased. My trusty Tanda gave out after 10+ years of use on all kinds of bumps, cuts and abrasions. Though you're supposed to charge 12 hours, I plugged in via USB and used it for several minutes and the amount of illumination is quite a bit better than I got from my Tanda. Also, the angle is better for most applications. Not sure about the anti-aging benefits but the wound healing benefits of red LED treatment has saved me untold hours of annoyance and inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: ChocolateMaven

customer_reviews.title: Large surface area
customer_reviews.text: This LED light area covers a larger portion of my face at one time and its comfortable to hold. I love that about it
customer_reviews.author: FYNEPEN

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I was so looking forward to using it. After charging for 12 hours, I went to use it and it reverted back to needs recharge mode. After charging another 12 hours til the light stopped blinking, I went to use it and it reverted back to needs recharge mode. I give up. Returning it to get my $74 black. Disappointed. Really like the shape and the promise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good. I am 73 years old so I know ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, good. I am 73 years old so I know it will take a while to show better results! I do believe I see a soften of the skin. It being a FDA approved product, got my attention. Will revisit at a later date with how it is going.
customer_reviews.author: Beanie

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!
customer_reviews.text: It says to use it three times a week and I did after that every other day my skin looks beautiful and gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: I call BS on pain relief and scar reduction
customer_reviews.text: I have had this now for a few months and been using it religiously but at last, I must give it a truthful review. Save you money this unit does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Bear88

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get a new one!
customer_reviews.text: This product appeared to be used. Hence, I didn’t use it and can’t comment on the ease of use, pain or effectiveness. I was so disappointed. 😔
customer_reviews.author: Hope Z.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Using this item for a few weeks, my visual scar tissue is diminishing. Easy to use. I even bought one for my hubby.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great quality red light machine.
customer_reviews.text: I love that this little light is portable and goes off automatically after three minutes, that’s the recommended for use in one area at a time. I just reset and move it around until I have targeted all the areas I want to use it on. Only been using about four weeks and can already see a difference in my skin. I am using to tighten and firm face and neck. Working for me.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Filbrandt

customer_reviews.title: but I like the
customer_reviews.text: Taking a bit to see results, but I like the product
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Ann Day

customer_reviews.title: Joke
customer_reviews.text: Joke. No improvement on anything. And my refund went on amazon gift card? I do not use this ,should be refunded as paid.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Joe

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I use this every other day. I use a green tea lotion and then use this. I highly recommend this to anyone who wants to help their skin. I have pictures of before and after. I can see a difference and I am pleased. The skin on my face is smoother and better. I will continue using this.
customer_reviews.author: Addon

customer_reviews.title: Dries my skin
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about this product yet!! Easy to use but my skin becomes very dry after I use and I'm not sure if I'm seeing the results I wanted. I'm 60 , not 45 so I'm taking that into consideration.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won't hold a charge
customer_reviews.text: After a couple uses it would take 3 days to charge. Now after 4 months it won't hold a charge.
customer_reviews.author: Donald A.

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this in response to some of the reviews. I have used this daily for a week and have had absolutely no problem with charging. I think it is a very good value.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Adkins

customer_reviews.title: It hasn’t done a thing for my face.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this 4 months ago and have used it faithfully as directed. It hasn’t done a thing for my skin. I’m 64 years old. It’s probably too late to help me!
customer_reviews.author: janted

customer_reviews.title: Takes time but u will see results. complexion refining & smoothing
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint i have is after a few month i noticed it did bot hold a charge cery long even when i charged it for up to four hours at a time before using.😳
customer_reviews.author: MARTIN J HINOJOSA

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when I purchased this, but after 2 months I do feel a difference in my skin.
customer_reviews.author: J. Carrabus

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Seems to tighten the skin after 2 weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: Used this for months with no changes, very disappointing! I would not recommend this and I would not buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Juanita L.

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth purchasing.. soft skin.
customer_reviews.text: I use it regularly.. what I like most about it is that it’s easy to use around mouth and smile lines before going out.. it plumps the skin leaving it looking healthy.
customer_reviews.author: noella kirkham

customer_reviews.title: Diode broken
customer_reviews.text: Two of the diode thingys are missing as seen in picture after It fell on the ground. Nothing is broken and it works perfectly just wanted to know if it's still safe to use?
customer_reviews.author: sharnjit

customer_reviews.title: After a little more than 4 weeks I see some ...
customer_reviews.text: After a little more than 4 weeks I see some improvement in my skin. It has not removed all of my wrinkles (I'm 63), but any little bit helps. I'll continue using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It lights up but I do not notice it doing anything at all.
customer_reviews.author: Penny V.

customer_reviews.title: This is a piece of junk. Very cheaply made ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of junk. Very cheaply made, did not work. Not sure how this device ever cleared FDA.
customer_reviews.author: anita

customer_reviews.title: I'm a believer.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, have noticed some benefits from it. Use it on my scalp too and it puts out the same power as those other hair lasers that charge $500+! After a week I've noticed tighter and more vibrant skin and softer thicker hair growing from a thinning area. Battery last a good amount and the auto turn off after 3 minutes is cool so no need to set a timer. Do one 15 minute session a day on different areas on face and vertex of my crown.
customer_reviews.author: ShawnyB91Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I like the size and the fact you can use it ...
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when I purchased this, but I can honestly say it's well surpassed my expectations. I like the size and the fact you can use it cordless. The automatic shut-off is very helpful; no need to watch the clock to treat each area the same amount of time. There is a drastic difference in my face on the days I use it. I would definitely recommend it without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: tjnan4

customer_reviews.title: Highly suggest!
customer_reviews.text: Noticed an immediate reduction in acne and rosacea after only a few days. My doctor suggested 20 minutes a day per area for 2 weeks, then maintenance treatments, despite directions included w device, and I have been very happy. It's only been a few days, so I haven't noticed a huge change in any major wrinkles, but my acne cleared up and my skin is not red for the first time since high school! Used it on some small spider veins from having my daughter and they also show a change after only a few days. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Died after about a month of use
customer_reviews.text: Too late to return even bought a new charger thinking that this might be the problem....No! deader than a door nail!
customer_reviews.author: Cloudhopper

customer_reviews.title: You have to be patient and use it regularly
customer_reviews.text: I needed to wait a while to see of this product really worked. It took over a month to see results. My skin is so much smoother and my pores look smaller. I have terrible rosacea and this seems to keep it calm. That has been the best part of how my skin has changed. I was using all kinds of products on my face and it only made my skin worse. I will never stop using this. Ive never been happier with the quality of my skin as I am now.
customer_reviews.author: monica glass

customer_reviews.title: my back pain is better and my face is glowing
customer_reviews.text: Just using this for a week, my back pain is better and my face is glowing. I can't wait to see how much better I will look and feel in a few weeks. I am tempted to purchase a red light bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not very effective
customer_reviews.text: Would not buy this product again as I do not find it to be very effective at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mory

customer_reviews.title: It really works.
customer_reviews.text: I can see a difference in elasticity of my facial skin. I use it every other day like suggested. It takes a long time though.
customer_reviews.author: dianastasia

customer_reviews.title: Works, but slowly
customer_reviews.text: I have noticed a decrease in fine lines but of course it takes time. Certainly not like a face lift! It is easy to use. I watch tv while doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald J. Spoto

customer_reviews.title: Safe
customer_reviews.text: Is seems to be safe and I do not see any significant difference.
customer_reviews.author: Karen R.

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: does nothing for the wrinkles. Very easy to use but ineffective for wrinkles on the face. don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Audri

customer_reviews.title: but like it up to now
customer_reviews.text: so far to see results, but like it up to now. will update later on
customer_reviews.author: YRN

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Helps my knees and the crease in my mouth area
customer_reviews.author: Mary M. Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Great light therapy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one for wife who suffered with rosacea. It helped her get better. She’s been using it every week and so happy with her skin.
customer_reviews.author: Tony S.

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t turn on!!!!! 😤
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t use it right away. It doesn’t turn on even if I try to charge it. !!! Very dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little tool. It covers nearly one cheek so it doesn't have to be moved as frequently as some others.
customer_reviews.author: GA Mountain Gal

customer_reviews.title: Took it out to use yesterday and it didn't work any better I realize I should of returned then
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this product in July I used it maybe 4 or 5 times and wasn't really impressed with it and stuck it in a drawer. Took it out to use yesterday and it didn't work any better I realize I should of returned then. I am asking to return it now really not happy
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Buzzelli

customer_reviews.title: ... was not working - it is now working just fine again.
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a review because the product was not working - it is now working just fine again.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Judi

customer_reviews.title: avoid this one
customer_reviews.text: The large head is good, but what's not good is you must charge it for 12 hours before it will work. Then, you have to remember to continue to charge it or else the charge will run out and then you have to do it al over again. I don't remember to keep charing it and it's frustrating when I want to use it. I plugged it in last night and I hoped I could use it this morning but NO, it's still charging. Not crazy about this one, wouldn't recommend. Update: it just stopped working after 9 months. Get something else. I would prefer just a electrical one that always comes on when you plug it in
customer_reviews.author: S.S.X.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I take medication that makes me booze very easy . This does speed up healing
customer_reviews.author: dean fluss

customer_reviews.title: Not sure yet
customer_reviews.text: Used a few times already. Takes time. Not sure if its working yet. Feels luke my skin looks a little bit better. We'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

product_meta.title: Pulsaderm Red LED - Light Therapy Technology - FDA Cleared
feature_bullets: FDA CLEARED - This LED Red Light Therapy device is cleared for use by the FDA and is used target fine lines, wrinkles, and crow's feet, plus it helps improve skin texture. The maximum results occur in three to seven weeks. You will see gradual improvements in the targeted areas with each subsequent session.

LED RED LIGHT THERAPY – This device uses a NASA developed light therapy technology that activates skin cells. It employs a wavelength at the optimal power intensity that's medically proven when it comes to alleviating the skin problems caused by aging and sun damage.

QUICK AND EASY TO USE – The Pulsaderm Red LED should ideally be used in 3 minute treatments 3 times a week. Before use, make sure that your skin is clean, free from any makeup, oil, or dirt. Use the included safety goggles as a precaution to shield your eyes from the light. The non-coherent light is not harmful to the eyes. Gently place the device over the desired skin area and hold it in place! No other tools or products are needed.

NON-INVASIVE PROCEDURE – Unlike laser treatments or IPLs that require long healing periods, Pulsaderm Skin Renewal is gentle, painless, and non-abrasive. It utilizes red, non-coherent LED light waves that are designed to penetrate deep into the skin. Some may even find the treatment to be comfortable and relaxing.

PROMOTES COLLAGEN PRODUCTION – This product activates skin cells to promote collagen production. The energy delivered by the LEDs enhances cellular metabolism in order to accelerate the repair of damaged skin cells and stimulate the production of structural proteins.
